content: Veloxty is a dedicated hosting service company that provides fast, secure and reliable dedicated hosting solutions, including dedicated bare metal servers, dedicated storage servers, dedicated GPU servers and dedicated streaming servers at cheap affordable prices.--------------------------DEDICATED SERVERS--------------------------Netherlands Dedicated ServersPowerful dedicated custom Intel Xeon E3, E5, Silver, Gold and Platinum servers hosting in Netherlands with free DDoS protection, starting from $84.95France Dedicated ServersPremium AMD Ryzen and EPYC and Intel Xeon scalable servers hosting in France with unlimited transfer, starting from $97.95Germany Dedicated ServersEnterprise bare metal Intel Core, Intel Xeon, AMD Ryzen and AMD EPYC servers hosting in Germany with unlimited transfer, starting from $97.95Switzerland Dedicated ServersPrivate Intel Xeon servers hosting in Switzerland with free DDoS protection, starting from $113.95Russia Dedicated ServersOffshore Intel Core and Intel Xeon server hosting in Russia with unlimited transfer, starting from $127.95UK Dedicated ServersPowerful dedicated Intel Xeon bare metal server hosting in the UK with free DDoS protection and free setup, starting from $99.95--------------------------ACCEPTABLE USE POLICY--------------------------https://veloxty.net/acceptable-use-policy--------------------------PAYMENT OPTIONS--------------------------BitcoinLitecoinDogecoinUSD ACH/Wire TransferEUR SEPA TransferGBP Faster Payment--------------------------CONTACT INFORMATION--------------------------Veloxty LLCWebsite: https://veloxty.netEmail: info@veloxty.net
